name: Mitosis (itch) (PixelShell)
description:
A top-down shooter game where your enemies keep multiplying!

Made for Jamination 6 in 48 hours.

Controls:

A D to move, left click to attack.

Credits:

  1. Deniz Vural (PixelShell) - Programming
  2. Taha Tüfekçi - Programming
  3. Safa Ebrar Bozkurt - 3D Modeling

Music Used:

  1. https://soundcloud.com/kevin-9-1/bit-shift
  2. Kevin Macleod - Nonstop
